QuestData.Title: The Northern Flank
QuestData.Description: I have ordered a defensive perimeter set up on our northern coast, at the Slithering Cove. Our scouts reported that the naga were trying to make landfall there.$B$BGralok is in charge of the operation - report to him and secure that beach!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Gralok at the Slithering Cove in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Gralok at the Slithering Cove in Twilight Highlands.
QuestData.RewardText: Warlord Zaela sent you? Good.$B$BIf you Horde are as strong as your Warchief promised, I expect to see some bloodshed on these shores.
